subTitle: Explore my portfolio showcasing diverse React Native App projects highlighting creativity, functionality, and technical expertise.

apps.title: Full-stack Ecommerce App
apps.description: A powerful cross-platform e-commerce mobile application built for seamless sanitary product shopping. Designed with a modern UI, smooth navigation, and secure backend integration.
descriptionPoints: Cross-platform app built using React Native for Android & iOS.
Smart product browsing with category filters.
Dynamic cart system with real-time updates.
Stripe payment integration for secure transactions.
User authentication & profile management.
Admin dashboard for product and order management.
Backend powered by Node.js, Express.js, MySQL.
Images stored in Firebase Storage.

apps.title: Pic Nova AI (AI Based Pics & Videos Editing App)
apps.description: An advanced AI-powered media editing app that allows users to edit photos and videos using machine learning models. Designed for creators who want powerful effects with simplicity.
descriptionPoints: AI-based photo editing with advanced enhancement tools.
Background removal using machine learning models.
AI filters & face enhancement.
Video stylization using real-time AI effects.
Cloud-based processing for efficiency.
Smooth cross-platform performance.
Secure backend API powered by Node.js & Express.js.
Firebase integrated for storage and authentication.

apps.title: Tap & Win Game (Lottery Type)
apps.description: A lottery-based prize-winning mobile game featuring hidden reward boxes, wallet integration, and real-time interaction via sockets.
descriptionPoints: Fun and interactive lottery-style gameplay.
Wallet integration for EasyPaisa, JazzCash, and Stripe.
User registration and secure authentication.
Real-time events using socket communication.
Animated UI/UX for smooth gameplay.
Prize tracking with winner history.
Backend built using Node.js, Express.js, and MySQL.
Scalable architecture with cross-platform support.

videos.title: PicNova (AI Based Pics & Video Editing App)
